statements: SELECT * FROM VitalSigns;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM VitalSigns WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure FROM VitalSigns WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%High%';
SELECT patient_id, body_temperature FROM VitalSigns ORDER BY body_temperature DESC;
SELECT patient_id, timestamp FROM VitalSigns WHERE timestamp > '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM VitalSigns ORDER BY timestamp DESC, patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, body_temperature FROM VitalSigns WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate, MAX(body_temperature) AS max_body_temperature FROM VitalSigns GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id, blood_pressure FROM VitalSigns WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%/70%';
SELECT * FROM VitalSigns WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM VitalSigns;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM VitalSigns WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT patient_id, temperature FROM VitalSigns WHERE temperature < 98.6;
SELECT * FROM HealthParameters WHERE disease_type = 'Diabetes';
SELECT patient_id, medication FROM HealthParameters WHERE activity_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM VitalSigns WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY heart_rate DESC, blood_pressure ASC;
SELECT patient_id, temperature FROM VitalSigns WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, disease_type, medication FROM HealthParameters WHERE disease_type IN ('COVID-19', 'Influenza') AND activity_level = 'Low';
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate, AVG(blood_pressure) AS avg_blood_pressure FROM VitalSigns;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature FROM VitalSigns GROUP BY patient_id HAVING max_temperature > 100;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT heart_rate, temperature FROM vital_signs WHERE blood_pressure = 'Normal' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_info WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE data->>'device_type' = 'Blood Pressure Monitor' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-01-31';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM device_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_info WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT heart_rate, blood_pressure, temperature FROM vital_signs WHERE temperature > 98.6 ORDER BY heart_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE patient_id = 'c72cd84a-7295-4df8-9f3c-df8f70b68a1c'
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patient_info WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT device_id, timestamp, data FROM device_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM vital_signs;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT id, patient_id, weight FROM health_parameters ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE data_type = 'blood_type';
SELECT device_id, registration_date FROM device_registration ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) FROM health_parameters GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT patient_id, MAX(weight) FROM health_parameters GROUP BY patient_id
SELECT patient_id, data_type, data_value FROM patient_data WHERE data_type LIKE '%pressure%'
SELECT patient_id, registration_date FROM device_registration WHERE DATE(registration_date) = '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM patient_info;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patient_info ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, gender, email FROM patient_info WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND blood_pressure LIKE '%120%';
SELECT patient_id, steps_count, calories_burned FROM activity_level WHERE calories_burned >= 2000 ORDER BY steps_count DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patient_info WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND temperature < 98.6
SELECT patient_id, sleep_duration FROM sleep_patterns WHERE sleep_quality = 'good'
SELECT activity_type, steps_count, calories_burned FROM activity_level ORDER BY calories_burned DESC, steps_count ASC
SELECT * FROM medication_logs WHERE date_taken >= '2022-01-01' AND time_taken BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00'
